articles.content: Following up to our coverage of the Ryzen 9 4900HS, today we're going to be testing the AMD Ryzen 7 4800H laptop processor. While the 4900HS was definitely a very interesting part, its probably not going to be as widely available as the 4800H which targets a … [+14581 chars]

articles.description: Apple AirPods were the best best-selling hearables in India, followed by Realme Buds Air, pTron Bassbuds and Noise Shots X1 Air.
